publication.title: Installing, Running and Maintaining Large Linux Clusters at CERN
publication.authors: vladimir bahyl,benjamin chardi,jan van eldik,thorsten kleinwort,martin murth,tim smith
publication.abstract: Abstract: This paperdescribes the tools and processes we have implemented, working in close collaboration with the EDG project [1], especially with theWP4 subtask, to improve the manageability of our clusters, in particular in the areas of system installation, configuration, andmonitoring
